name: Shoot 'n Loot
description:
While exploring a dungeon, you get lost and have nothing but a bow and an arrow. Now you need to fight monsters and try to escape this crazy place!

Welcome to Shoot n' Loot, a roguelite game created to Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1

Credits

Created by RickZinho
Tested by PRBYawn
Some sound effects by Erdie, Moulaythami, Taiki. Taken from Freesound.org
